extension.name: eMundus - Send email to referent
extension.author: Brice Hubinet
extension.description: Emundus Referent Status, enables you to send out emails to referents at a defined status

field.name: referent_status_mail_id
field.label: Email template id *
field.description: This template will be use to send the email to referees

field.name: referent_status_step
field.label: Status *
field.description: Status to defined when the email has to been sent

field.name: referent_status_fabrik_elements
field.label: Fabrik elements *
field.description: Fabrik elements that contains referees's emails (ex: emundus_references__Email_1)

field.name: referent_status_attachments_letters
field.label: Documents to check *
field.description: Documents to check to check sending emails

field.name: referent_status_fabrik_form
field.label: Fabrik Form *
field.description: Fabrik form to complete by referent
